TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit JavaScriptConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 為自訂型別轉換子提供抽象基底類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for a custom type converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您實作序列化和還原序列化程序的原生不支援的 managed 型別類別。The class enables you to implement serialization and deserialization processes for managed types that are not natively supported by the class. 您也可以使用時需要更多控制序列化和還原序列化程序。You can also use when you need more control over the serialization and deserialization process. 屬性會指出自訂轉換子提供轉換子服務的型別。The property indicates the types for which a custom converter provides converter services. 若要指出自訂轉換子必須能使用由執行個體，您必須註冊轉換器與執行個體。To indicate that a custom converter must be used by the instance, you must register the converter with the instance. 如果您使用直接類別中，您應該使用註冊轉換器方法。If you are using the class directly, you should use the method to register the converter. 否則，如果您叫用 Web 方法，從 ECMAScript (JavaScript)，而且您想要使用自訂轉換子，您可以註冊它藉由新增`converters`組態檔中的項目。Otherwise, if you are invoking Web methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript) and you want to use the custom converter, you can register it by adding a `converters` element in the configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30). 當執行個體已序列化的類型，它有已註冊，自訂轉換子的序列化程式呼叫方法。When the instance is serializing a type for which it has a custom converter registered, the serializer calls the method. 同樣地，當執行個體還原序列化的 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 字串，並且辨識在 JSON 字串型別具有相關聯的序列化程式呼叫它的自訂轉換器方法。Similarly, when the instance is deserializing a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) string and recognizes that a type inside the JSON string has a custom converter associated with it, the serializer calls the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂轉換子類別。The following example shows how to create a custom converter for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#2)]

block.para:
當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員：
When you inherit from , you must override the following members:
-
-
- 提供方法的實作器會使用。 provides the method that will be used by implementers of .轉換子程式碼必須能夠進行序列化程式會將傳遞給它，在字典中包含的值，然後將該值轉換為型別的物件。Converter code must be able to take a value that is contained in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value into an object of type .而不需重新實作的自訂轉換程式碼完成這項作業，您可以呼叫方法。Rather than re-implementing the custom conversion code to accomplish this, you can call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Deserialize (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> dictionary, Type type, System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> dictionary, class System.Type type, class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer) cil managed

public: abstract System::Object ^ Deserialize(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ dictionary, Type ^ type, System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptSerializer ^ serializer);

param.name: dictionary
param.span: 以名稱/值組方式儲存的屬性資料之 執行個體。

span.span: An instance of property data stored as name/value pairs.
The type of the resulting object.
The instance.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將提供的字典轉換成屬於指定型別的物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, converts the provided dictionary into an object of the specified type.
The deserialized object.

para.span: 方法中的值會逐一來建構執行個體在要求的型別參數參數。

span.span: The method iterates through the values in the parameter to construct an instance of the type requested in the parameter.

para.span: 雖然轉換子可以直接使用的值，我們建議使用轉換器實作器方法改為。

span.span: Although a converter can directly use values from , we recommend that the converter implementer use the method instead.

para.span: 轉換器應該呼叫這個方法的可從執行個體參數。

span.span: The converter should call this method of the instance available from the parameter.

para.span: 方法可讓轉換器，將屬性值，從，然後傳回預期類型的值。

span.span: The method enables converter to pass a property value from , and then return a value of the expected type.

para.span: 在某些情況下，自訂類型轉換器可能會使用屬性本身有已註冊轉換器 （例如，輸入具有類型 B 」 的屬性和類型 B 也是自訂的轉換子相關聯）。

span.span: In some cases, a converter for a custom type might be working with properties that themselves have registered converters (for example, type A has a property of type B, and type B is also associated with a custom converter).

para.span: 在此情況下，叫用可確保自訂轉換子，將會以遞迴方式包含在字典中的屬性資料的叫用。

span.span: In that case, invoking makes sure that custom converters will be recursively invoked for property data that is contained in the dictionary.

para.span: 當轉換有逐一查看字典中的所有項目時，它會傳回建構的執行個體的目標類型。

span.span: When the converter has iterated through all entries in the dictionary, it returns a constructed instance of the target type.

para.span: 如果轉換器還原序列化期間遇到問題，則應該擲回描述問題的錯誤。

span.span: If the converter encounters a problem during deserialization, it should throw an error that describes the problem.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> Serialize(object obj, class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer serializer) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Serialize (obj As Object, serializer As JavaScriptSerializer) As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: abstract System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ Serialize(System::Object ^ obj, System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptSerializer ^ serializer);

span.span: The object to serialize.
The object that is responsible for the serialization.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建置由名稱/值組所組成的字典。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, builds a dictionary of name/value pairs.

returns.span: 包含代表物件資料之索引鍵/值組的物件。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent the object’s data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您序列化為其註冊自訂轉換子，型別執行個體叫用方法。When you serialize a type for which a custom converter is registered, the instance invokes the method.

para.span: 傳回值必須具有零或多個名稱/值組表示要轉換成 JSON 物件的資料執行個體。

span.span: The return value of must be an instance with zero or more name/value pairs that represent an object’s data to be converted to JSON.

para.span: 轉換器本身不會將資料序列化為 JSON。

span.span: The converter itself does not serialize data as JSON.

para.span: 相反地，轉換器會建置包含的屬性名稱 （字典的字串索引鍵） 和對應屬性的名稱/值組的字典值 （在字典中的物件值）。

span.span: Instead, the converter builds a dictionary of name/value pairs that contain the property names (the string key for the dictionary) and corresponding property values (the object value in the dictionary).

para.span: 後續執行個體轉換為 JSON。

span.span: The instance subsequently converts these to JSON.

para.span: 如果轉換器遇到例外狀況，則應該擲回描述問題的錯誤。

span.span: If the converter encounters an exception, it should throw an error that describes the problem.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SupportedTypes As IEnumerable(Of Type)

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得所支援型別的集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of the supported types.

value.span: 實作 的物件，表示轉換子支援的型別。

span.span: An object that implements that represents the types supported by the converter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性列出轉換器所支援的型別。The property lists the types that are supported by the converter. 在執行階段，執行個體會使用這個屬性，以判斷其對應的自訂轉換器的 managed 類型的對應。At run time, a instance uses this property to determine the mapping of managed types to their corresponding custom converters. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的屬性。The following example shows how to override the property in a derived class. 在此範例中，這個轉換子只能支援型別。In this example, the converter supports only the type. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#3)]

para.span: 一律會傳回一個集合，集合和集合必須包含至少一個項目。

span.span: must always return a collection, and the collection must contain at least one entry.
